title: Seeking to counter China, US awards $3 bn for EV battery production in 14 states
description: The Biden administration is allocating over $3 billion to U.S. companies to enhance domestic production of advanced batteries for electric vehicles. This funding aims to reduce China's dominance in battery production and support the administration's climate change strategy. The grants will support 25 projects across 14 states, creating thousands of jobs.
